Description

Class to represent book authors

Class to represent books

Factory class for BookStore

Interface class for BookStore service

Implementation class for BookStore service

Class to obtain database connector

Servlet for Home page that displays all books and has a search ability

Servlet to let user log into account

Servlet to log user out of account

Servlet confirms that order has been placed

Servlet for displaying user order history

Class to represent shopping basket
